name: LuxuryJourney
tagline: Digital Marketing for Luxury Boutique Hotels
description: Leading Hospitality Marketing New York. Luxury Journey is an NYC hospitality digital marketing expert, we provide internet hotel marketing services to the greater New York area. We are known for helping luxury fashion, lifestyle brands, and luxury hotels improve revenue with digital marketing. LuxuryJourney specializes in social media marketing, search engine marketing, and search engine optimization for the hospitality industry.
